alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 8:01AM CDT until July 21 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR EASTERN PERRY...SOUTH CENTRAL CONWAY...SOUTHWESTERN FAULKNER... NORTH CENTRAL SALINE AND NORTHWESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 800 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wye Mountain, or 8 miles southeast of Perryville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Perryville... Oppelo... Perry... Houston... Little Italy... Wye Mountain... Williams Junction... Roland in Pulaski County... Bigelow... Fourche... Antioch in Perry County... Wye... Palarm... Oak Grove in Perry County... Thornburg... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... Cherry Hill in Perry County... Natural Steps... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
